title: 2017 Chevrolet Silverado
item_description:
2017 Chevrolet Silverado

Specifications

    • Registration Expiration: 5/31/2025

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and smog certificate will be mailed 1 week following the last day of removal. The Seller sells this vehicle "as-is" in planned non-operational registration with no smog performed by the Seller. The Buyer agrees to purchase the vehicle "as-is" and agrees to repair and smog the vehicle. An "as-is" no-smog bill of sale must be signed by both buyer/seller in an agreement to these stated terms. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.

links.detail: The target is an image representing the item. The content-type specified determines the format of the image returned. image/png, image/jpeg, or image/gif are acceptable content-types.
